text: François Geindre (5 February 1946 - 2 January 2023) was a French politician for the Socialist Party. He served as mayor of Hérouville-Saint-Clair from 1971 to 2001. He was born in Meurthe-et-Moselle. Geindre died on 2 January 2023 in Caen. He was 76. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2023 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Normandy Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Calvados Category:People from Meurthe-et-Moselle Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians
title: François Geindre
